awards:
第61届柏林国际电影节(2011)
　　主竞赛单元 最佳短片(提名) 萍帕卡·托维拉

director.name: 萍帕卡·托维拉  Pimpaka Towira

introduction: A young soldier stationed in the troubled southern Thai region is on his annual leave to his hometown in Udorn Thani. Upon his return, he finds out that his girlfriend has settled with a new western lover in their village. He blames it on his chosen military career, and starts to get angry at her and everyone around him. But his sister reminds him that forgiveness is not a difficult thing to do, but it has to start from within.
